detail_desc: Dress in an airy, patterned cotton weave with flutter sleeves and buttons at the back. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Soft cotton lining at the top.
Short-sleeved Henley shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, button placket and small fabric appliqué at the hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in washed denim with flap chest pockets with a button, buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist and lined gusset.

Long jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Shirt dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gathered, flared skirt. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an adjustable, elasticated waist and decorative flatlock seams.
5-pocket trousers in washed, slightly stretchy twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless dress in a soft, patterned viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Gathered yoke with a flounce at the front. Unlined.

Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and large, pointed lace collar. Opening with a concealed zip at the back and button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a grandad collar, button placket and chest pocket. Yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with a small fabric appliqué at one side.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket with a button.
Fitted, knee-length skirt woven in a cotton blend with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and a sewn-in wrapover at the front with decorative buttons at the top. Unlined.
Earrings with shell-shaped pendants. Length approx. 4.7 cm.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest which, combined with a gently tapered waist, creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Lightly padded biker jacket in softly draping imitation leather with quilted sections on the shoulders, sleeves and back. Notch lapels with press-studs and a large, detachable faux fur trim. Diagonal zip down the front, zipped front pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Quilted lining.

Oversized denim jacket with a collar and smooth metal buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Dropped shoulders, flap chest pocket with a button, pockets in the side seams and adjustable tabs with buttons at the back.
Jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with narrow, braided shoulder straps and elastication at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and 3/4-length, wide legs.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring jersey waistband, side pockets and rounded hems.
Skinny-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an all-over print and worn details. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.
Dress in a spotted silk and Tencel™ lyocell weave with a V-neck and flounces at the front. Narrow adjustable grosgrain shoulder straps, a concealed zip in one side and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Short, A-line dress in crisp cotton poplin with a square, gathered neckline, covered elastication at the shoulders and long, voluminous puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Parka in cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Lined hood, a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Handwarmer pockets, diagonal, flap front pockets and an inner pocket. Adjustable tab and press stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.

Knee-length dress in a textured weave with a V-neck and short butterfly sleeves. Opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck, zip at the back, seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt and a straight skirt with slits in the sides. Unlined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, an open back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a ribbed polo neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
3/4-length leggings in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and scalloped hems.
Short dressing gown in soft, ribbed jersey with long, wide sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Fancy dress costume in woven fabric with a print motif and a matching helmet. The costume has a stand-up collar with a padded edge, zip down the front and elasticated hems. The helmet has a hook and loop fastening at the front.
Top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend in a narrow cut at the top with a racer back.
5-pocket jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a reversible sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in sizes 1½-3Y). Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake pockets.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and smocked back. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Long, sleeveless dress in an airy weave in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps. Narrow, elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Straight-style jumper in a soft rib knit with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
High-waisted suit trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, and slim, tapered legs.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, back pocket and contrasting colour trims.
3/4-length leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket, knee-length skirt in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and slit at the front of the hem.
Cap in cotton twill with an embroidered detail on the front and an adjustable strap with a metal fastening at the back.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of joggers. T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a print motif on one leg. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, printed functional fabric with reflective details.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in an airy weave with a covered elasticated waistband. Lined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Short skirt in a soft weave with buttons down the front, a high waist, detachable tie belt, pleats at the top and side pockets. Unlined.
5-pocket trousers in cotton corduroy with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Spacious paper straw shopper with two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 8x30x31 cm.
Earrings with thin hoop pendants. Length 2.8 cm.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in mesh with gathers in the sides.
A-line dress in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Ankle-length treggings in cotton sweatshirt fabric. Skinny fit with a ribbed, easy pull-on, elasticated waist. Fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Triangle bikini top with padded cups, laser-cut edges and ties at the back of the neck and back.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a frill-trimmed stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves with a frill at the cuffs. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in soft, cable-knit organic cotton with buttons on the shoulders, long raglan sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
LIMITED EDITION. Sleeveless, empire-line lace dress with a pleat and small frill trim. Pearly buttons at the back and a layered underskirt for added width. Cotton lining.
Calf-length, A-line skirt in a patterned linen and viscose weave. Wide elastication at the back of the waist and a sewn-in tie belt at the front.
Lightly padded, velvet-covered Alice band.
Long-sleeved, cold shoulder jumper in a soft knit containing some wool. Ribbed V-neck front and back and trashed ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Cotton poplin shirt with a button-down collar, open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Gloves in soft leather with a soft, fine-knit lining.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved dress in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and a seam and wide flounce at the hem.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with an opening with lacing and lace embroidery at the back, and short sleeves with overlocked edges.
T-shirt in printed slub cotton jersey.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a rounded lace collar and press-studs at the back of the neck. Long, puff sleeves with a narrow trim at the cuffs, and press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.

Set with a top in soft cotton jersey and a pair of pull-on trousers in woven fabric. Top with flutter sleeves and a print motif on the front. Trousers with an all-over print, covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Fitted, one-shoulder top in velour with shimmering spots. One long sleeve.

Sleeveless dress in a double layer of tulle, the top layer with glittery spots. Large decorative bow at the neck, an opening with a shimmering button at the back of the neck and a seam at the hips with a wide flounce. Satin lining.
